```{r}
vec_1 <- c(2, 5, 9, 10, 8, 12, 1, 0)
class(vec_1)
typeof(vec_1)
vec_1_e3 <- vec_1[3]
vec_1_e1 <- vec_1[1]
vec_1_e5to7 <- vec_1[5:7]
vec_1_char <- as.character(vec_1) 
```

```{r}
vec_2 <- c(town = "Santa Barbara", 
           location = "Rincon", 
           swell = "south")
class(vec_2)
vec_2_e2 <- vec_2[2]
ocean_vec_df <- data.frame(region = c("A", "B", "C", "D"), 
                     species = c("otter", "great white", "sea lion", "gray whale"),
                     count = c(12, 2, 36, 6))
class(ocean_vec_df)
class(ocean_vec_df$species)

max_count <- max(ocean_vec_df$count)
```
